gpu: X.Org Radeon RX 580 Series (POLARIS10 / DRM 3.23.0 / 4.15.0-36-generic, LLVM 6.0.0)
notes: Cleared the first three tutorial missions with no trouble out of box. After clicking Play, be patient and wait, the all-white screen will go away after a few seconds.  Once the game loads it runs smoothly. Sound and in-game movies work fine.
